title: The continuity of $p$-rationality of characters and the principal block
authors: Gunter Malle, J. Miquel Mart\'inez, Carolina Vallejo
abstract:
We study rationality properties of irreducible characters of finite groups.
We show that the continuity of $2$-rationality is a phenomenon that can be
detected in the principal $2$-block, thus refining a recent result of N. N.
Hung. We also propose a conjectural group theoretical criterion for the
continuity gap at level $1$ for all primes
